question_text: Select three valid technical characteristics of Bluetooth operation:
answer_options: Operates in the 2.4 GHz ISM band
Designed for long-range multi-floor building coverage
Typically supports up to 10 meters range for consumer devices
Requires regulatory licensing in most countries
correct_answer: Operates in the 2.4 GHz ISM band
Typically supports up to 10 meters range for consumer devices
explanation: Bluetooth uses unlicensed ISM spectrum, is optimized for personal device connectivity, and typically ranges around 10 meters.
